data.question: What is the empirical formula of bio-MOF-101?
What method was used for the absorption correction in the single crystal X-ray diffraction experiments for bio-MOF-101?
What is the crystal system of bio-MOF-102?
Did the transformation from bio-MOF-100 to bio-MOF-102 result in a change in crystal color?
data.answer: Yes, the colorless bio-MOF-100 crystals transformed into dark orange crystals.

data.question: Is the space group of bio-MOF-103 Ia-3d?
What was the final R1 value for the structure refinement of bio-MOF-102?
Was complete ligand exchange observed in the transformation of bio-MOF-102 to bio-MOF-103?
data.answer: No, approximately 85% NH2-TPDC and 15% residual ABDC were observed.

data.question: Is bio-MOF-101 less porous than bio-MOF-103?
What was the purpose of using supercritical CO2 activation experiments?
data.answer: To activate bio-MOF-101, bio-MOF-100, bio-MOF-102, and bio-MOF-103 by thoroughly washing them with dry ethanol.

data.question: Did the pore volume of bio-MOF-102 exceed that of bio-MOF-100?
What was the unit cell dimension 'a' for bio-MOF-103?
Was the ligand exchange strategy successful in increasing the pore dimensions of MOF materials?
data.answer: Yes, it was successful in systematically increasing the pore dimensions.

data.question: Is the density of bio-MOF-102 less than 0.3 Mg/m3?
What was the crystal system used for bio-MOF-101?
Did the synthesis of bio-MOF-101 involve heating in an 85 oC oven for 24 hours?
data.answer: Yes, the synthesis involved heating in an 85 oC oven for 24 hours.

data.question: Is the space group for bio-MOF-100 Ia-3d?
What was the yield percentage for the synthesis of bio-MOF-101?
Was the ligand exchange from bio-MOF-101 to bio-MOF-100 performed at 75 °C?
data.answer: Yes, the ligand exchange was performed at 75 °C.

data.question: Is the empirical formula for bio-MOF-102 C52 H32 N16 O13 Zn4?
What was the method used for gas adsorption isotherms collection?
